overview.note: The Official Results list Jonas Galusha with 13810 votes and Isaac Tichenor with 9918 votes, but the county totals add up to 13932 for Galusha and 10137 for Tichenor.

sub_unit.name: Addison
sub_unit.note: The Vermont Republican, October 15, and the Vermont Centinel (Burlington, VT), October 19, list 1075 votes for Isaac Tichenor in Addison County.

sub_unit.name: Cornwall
sub_unit.note: The Vermont Republican, September 17, lists 70 votes for Isaac Tichenor in Cornwall.

sub_unit.name: Hancock
sub_unit.note: The Rutland Vermont Herald (Rutland, VT), September 19, and the Vermont Republican, September 10, list 39 votes for Jonas Galusha and 6 for Isaac Tichenor in Hancock.
The North Star (Danville, VT), September 15, lists 59 votes for Jonas Galusha and 7 votes for Isaac Tichenor in Hancock.

sub_unit.name: Leicester
sub_unit.note: The Vermont Republican, September 10, lists no votes for Isaac Tichenor in Leicester.

sub_unit.name: Orange
sub_unit.note: The Official Results list 1575 votes for Jonas Galusha and 835 for Isaac Tichenor in Orange County, though the town votes add up to 1688 for Galusha and 963 for Tichenor.
The Vermont Republican, October 15, and the Vermont Centinel (Burlington, VT), October 19, list 1579 votes for Jonas Galusha in Orange.

sub_unit.name: Brookfield
sub_unit.note: The votes from Brookfield were rejected.

sub_unit.note: The Rutland Vermont Herald (Rutland, VT), September 19, lists 14 votes for Jonas Galusha and 24 for Isaac Tichenor in Brownington.

sub_unit.name: Rutland
sub_unit.note: Several sources, including the Vermont Centinel (Burlington, VT), October 19, the Pittsfield Sun, October 24, the Rutland Vermont Herald (Rutland, VT), October 24, the Green Mountain Farmer, October 29, and the North Star (Danville, VT), October 20, list 2327 votes for Jonas Galusha and 1263 for Isaac Tichenor in Rutland County.

sub_unit.name: Mount Holly
sub_unit.note: The Rutland Vermont Herald (Rutland, VT), September 19, and the Vermont Republican, September 17, list 68 votes for Jonas Galusha in Mount Holly.

sub_unit.name: Rutland
sub_unit.note: The Rutland Vermont Herald (Rutland, VT), September 12, notes: "The votes for Governor in this town stood exactly tied. Galusha 168, and Tichenor the same, but there were 7 votes for Galusha and one for Tichenor put into the wrong box."
The North Star (Danville, VT), September 15, and the Vermont Republican, September 10, list 177 votes for each Jonas Galusha and Isaac Tichenor in Rutland.
